channel.title: 2019 on Jun Woo Shin
channel.description: Recent content in 2019 on Jun Woo Shin

item.title: CHIP8
item.description: GitHub: chip8 Demo: N/A I’ve always been interested in emulation - it seemed incredible that we could bring back past hardware and software.

item.title: Rainbow GIF
item.description: GitHub: rainbowgif Demo: N/A I’m a huge fan of Slack’s custom emojis and the various collections that have surfaced.

item.title: Done with School
item.description: After spending nearly your whole life doing something, it’s kind of weird to just stop. Sure, school sucked but it just sort of became a part of my life.
